example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但)) (NP-SBJ (NP (PN 其)) (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 入会))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 行动))) (VP (PP-PRP (P 因) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 早前)) (VP (VP-FOC (PP (P 与) (NP-PN (NR 美国))) (VP (VV 谈判))) (VP (VV 未果)))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 一直)) (VP (VV 延宕))))
